# ImageResource

**Structure**

An image resource.

## Declaration

```swift
struct ImageResource
```

## Initializers

- **init(name:bundle:)**: Creates an image from a resource with the specified name in the given bundle.

## Resource Definition

- **ColorResource**: A color resource.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype

items.description: Creates an image from a resource with the specified name in the given bundle.
